parameters.name: AutoRenew
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable auto-renewal. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

>  If this parameter is set to **true**, you must set the **Duration** parameter.

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description:
The auto-renewal period. Valid values: **1** to **12**. Unit: month.

>  This parameter is valid only when **AutoRenew** is set to **true**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeDBInstanceAttribute](~~62010~~) operation to query the region ID of the instance.
